channel.title: recent developments at Whonix
channel.description: - upgrade due to apt RCE bug - improved, safer, faster build process (mmdebstrap) - unified (single) ova (containing both VMs) for better usability - enhanced Whonix project legal protections - work on cross platform build support and reproducible builds - kloak - anti keystroke fingerprinting tool - porting to Debian buster - testers-only releases for Whonix 15

item.title: recent developments at Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
• upgrade due to apt RCE bug
  • improved, safer, faster build process (mmdebstrap)
  • unified (single) ova (containing both VMs) for better usability
  • enhanced Whonix project legal protections
  • work on cross platform build support and reproducible builds
  • kloak - anti keystroke fingerprinting tool
  • porting to Debian buster
  • testers-only releases for Whonix 15

Read full topic
